title: Concatenate Text for Output
description:
Using the starter blocks in the tray build a program that displays your name and age in the following example format.

Name: Sasha
Age: 17

You will need to change the text in both of the provided blocks. Use the '+' to concatenate or add two lines of text together.
hint:
Add each block in the tray to the editor. Then edit the name output block to include your name. Next, edit the age output block to use concatenation(i.e. +), similar to the how it was done in the name block, to add another piece of text that displays your age.

In this task you will need to remember, text must start and end with quotation marks and concatenation is used to add two or more groups of text together.
